PathOfBuilding.Notes:
consider BV? stack lots of more damage. after consideration BV is still best due to scale with physical dmg nodes
2nd choice Glacial cascade => phys to cold
more spell dmg:
flameblast 110*10
arcane surge 10 RF 20 conc eff 35 controled destruction 25 ele focus 30 efficacy 10
2H weapon for 6L BV Not: wideswing lvl20 AOE +25%dps, +mana cost Not: Hrimnor +20%dps Not: Xirg +lvl gem, rare staff beats it. Pledge of hand: +25%dps (no increased ver), +950mana, + mana cost duskdawn +34%dps (no increase version)
Void fordge?
